layout.value:
__lv_expr__:{HorizontalLayout}:lively.morphic:new HorizontalLayout({
  align: "top",
  autoResize: true,
  direction: "leftToRight",
  orderByIndex: false,
  padding: null,
  reactToSubmorphAnimations: false,
  resizeSubmorphs: false,
  spacing: 0
})

__lv_expr__:{TilingLayout}:lively.morphic:new TilingLayout({
  align: "center",
  axis: "column",
  orderByIndex: true,
  reactToSubmorphAnimations: false,
  spacing: 0
})
